email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. The laycan is October 10-15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market conditions. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

The OCEAN HARMONY has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 24.75 per metric ton. Does this meet your requirements?

Best,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Emily,

The revised rate looks more competitive. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as October 10-15. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best,
Emily Carter
